page.title: 08Leisure Activities
page.content:
{My Hobbies.} My hobbies are playing badminton with my Dad,swimming,brownies,ballet, gym- nastics,choir and Sunday School.I al- so like collecting shells and stamps. I collected stamps for my collector's badge for brownies and I've got over 200 now. At the weekends I do my gym- nastics. I am doing a routine and the vault at the moment for our display. Louise Knight, Oak Lodge. {Survey of Parents' Leisure Activities} 30 local families took part. Activity Parti- Activity Parti- cipants cipants --------------------------------------- Sport 13 DIY 10 Reading/TV 10 Gardening 14 Craft 13 Music 3 Church 1 Youth 8
Hawes Down
